In eXo Platform, the priority order of the display language decreases to the arrow direction from left to right: 
{docbook}
<para>
<menuchoice>
<guimenu>User's language</guimenu>
<guisubmenu>Cookies' language</guisubmenu>
<guisubmenu>Browser's language</guisubmenu>
<guimenuitem>Portal's language</guimenuitem>
</menuchoice> </para>
{docbook}
It means that the language set by the user will be at the highest level, and the portal's language at the lowest level.  

Accordingly, you should pay attention to this order when selecting your preferred display language.

{docbook}
<note>
<para>
At present, eXo Platform only supports two languages: English and French.
</para>
</note>
{docbook}

h1. Change the display language permanently{anchor:id=Platform_User_Guide.Get_started.Manage_Language.Change_Display_Language_Permanently}
eXo Platform supports 3 ways to change the display language permanently.

*The first way*
{docbook}
<para><emphasis role="bold">1.</emphasis> Hover your cursor over <guilabel>My Sites</guilabel> on the <guilabel>Administration</guilabel> bar and select your desired site where you want to change the display language. The currently selected site is marked with <inlinemediaobject>
            <imageobject>
              <imagedata fileref="images/Language/selected_site_icon.png" format="PNG" scalefit="1" width="4mm"/>
            </imageobject>
          </inlinemediaobject>.
</para>
{docbook}

!images/Language/Select_site.png|align="center" width="50mm" scalefit="1"!

You will be directed to your selected site.
{docbook}
<para><emphasis role="bold">2.</emphasis> Hover your cursor over <menuchoice>
            <guimenu>Edit</guimenu>
            <guisubmenu>Site</guisubmenu>
            <guimenuitem>Layout</guimenuitem>
          </menuchoice> from the drop-down menu.
</para>
{docbook}
!images/Language/Select_layout.png|align="center" width="50mm" scalefit="1"!

Your selected site will be displayed in the *Edit* mode.
{docbook}
<para>
          <emphasis role="bold">3.</emphasis> Click <inlinemediaobject>
            <imageobject role="fo">
              <imagedata fileref="images/Language/Site_config_button.png" format="PNG" scalefit="1" width="15mm"/>
            </imageobject>
            <imageobject role="html">
              <imagedata fileref="images/Language/Site_config_button.png" format="PNG" scalefit="0" width="15mm"/>
            </imageobject>
          </inlinemediaobject> in the <guilabel>Edit Inline Composer</guilabel> form. The <guilabel>Site Settings</guilabel> form appears.
      </para>

{docbook}

!images/Language/Portal_settings_form.png|align="center" width="100mm" scalefit="1"!
h1. Change the display language for another user{anchor:id=Platform_User_Guide.Get_started.Manage_Language.Change_Display_Language_For_Another_User}

By this way, you can change not only your display language but also the display language of another users if you have the right to access the *Organization* portlet.

{docbook}
<para>
          <emphasis role="bold">1.</emphasis> Hover your cursor over <inlinemediaobject>
            <imageobject role="fo">
              <imagedata fileref="images/gear_icon.png" format="PNG" scalefit="1" width="4mm"/>
            </imageobject>
            <imageobject role="html">
              <imagedata fileref="images/gear_icon.png" format="PNG" scalefit="0" width="4mm"/>
            </imageobject>
          </inlinemediaobject>, then select <menuchoice><guimenu>Users</guimenu><guimenuitem>Group and Roles</guimenuitem></menuchoice> from the drop-down menu to open the <guilabel>User Management</guilabel> form.
</para>
{docbook}
!images/Language/User_management.png|align="center" width="150mm" scalefit="1"!

*2.* Click !images/edit_icon.png|width="4mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"! corresponding to the user with the display language you want to change.

{docbook}
<para>
<emphasis role="bold">3.</emphasis> Select the <guilabel>User Profile</guilabel> sub-tab, then change the display language for this user from the <guilabel>Language</guilabel> field.
</para>
{docbook}

!images/Language/Select_language_for_another_user.png|align="center" width="100mm" scalefit="1"!

{docbook}
<para>
<emphasis role="bold">4.</emphasis> Click <guibutton>Save</guibutton> to accept your changes.
</para>
{docbook}
